name: The Crew
notes: The game was generally considered a success, and the game even spawned a sequel, however the controversy came in 2024 when the decision to shut down the servers for the game came as a shock to the community when they could no longer even play the Single Player campaign due to it being an always online game with no offline mode. The Crew's shutdown is the event that kickstarted the Stop Killing Games campaign.
description: The Crew is an Racing game, with a 20 hour campaign and online races. The campaing follows Alex Taylor who is framed for the murder of his older brother Dayton by FBI Special Agent Bill Coburn. After serving 5 years in prison he's approached by FBI Agent Zoe Winters, who asks him to help expose Coburn's corruption as well as help arrest the new leader of the 5-10 motor club, a group founded by Dayton, who's now being run by someone named Denis 'Shiv' Jefferson.
